title: Caroline's Choice
description: Dr. Caroline Jones's biological clock is ticking, but her boyfriend seems to be dragging his feet. So she gives him a little push. Instead of a proposal, Caroline's pressure tears apart their relationship apart. Suddenly, her dream of motherhood seems to be slipping away. That is, until her favorite student, Victor, knocks on the door. One look at his sultry Latino beauty and Caroline makes a rash, desperate decision. But is Victor only going to be her baby daddy? Or has her happily-ever-after been staring her in the face all along?  Note to readers: this is a steamy romance and contains graphic sex scenes.
author: Simone Beaudelaire
